mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHOP WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT SH.PRODUCT_NO, SH.PRODUCT_NAME, SH.PRODUCT_PRICE, SH.PRODUCT_STATUS, SH.PRODUCT_ORIGIN, SH.PRODUCT_BRAND, AT.CHANGE_NAME FROM SHOP SH LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON SH.PRODUCT_NO = AT.RPRODUCT_NO WHERE SH.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SH.PRODUCT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_ORIGIN, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_BRAND ) VALUES ( SEQ_SHOP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productOrigin}, #{productDetail}, #{productBrand} )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, RPRODUCT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, SEQ_SHOP_NO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT SH.PRODUCT_NO, SH.PRODUCT_NAME, SH.PRODUCT_PRICE, SH.PRODUCT_STOCK, SH.PRODUCT_STATUS, SH.PRODUCT_ORIGIN, SH.PRODUCT_DETAIL, SH.PRODUCT_BRAND, AT.CHANGE_NAME, AT.ORIGIN_NAME FROM SHOP SH INNER JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON SH.PRODUCT_NO = AT.RPRODUCT_NO WHERE SH.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' AND SH.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOP SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{productStock}, PRODUCT_ORIGIN = #{productOrigin}, PRODUCT_BRAND = #{productBrand}, PRODUCT_DETAIL = #{productDetail} WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
